sentences.sContent: I've become very disillusioned with politics.
sentences.sCn: 我变得对政治非常失望。

synos.tran: 使幻想破灭（disillusion的过去分词）；唤醒

trans.tranCn: 醒悟的；幻想破灭的；不抱幻想的
trans.tranOther: disappointed because you have lost your belief that someone is good, or that an idea is right

trans.tranCn: 使幻想破灭（disillusion的过去分词）；唤醒
